rows.label: qst201701_msg0030
rows.name:
*pant*...
*pant*... *pant*...

rows.label: qst201701_msg0001
rows.name:
Sharpen up, you dogs!
Dawdlers die first in battle!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0002
rows.name:
Mattragh, try again! If you did it
like that on the battlefield,
I'd kill you myself!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0031
rows.name: N-no way...

rows.label: qst201701_msg0003
rows.name: Diligent work, captain.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0004
rows.name: S-Special Inquisitor Meleph!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0005
rows.name:
Do Superbian soldiers train like this
every single day?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0006
rows.name: Indeed we do!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0007
rows.name:
Every day, rain or shine. We've got to
be ready to go at the drop of a hat,
you know.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0008
rows.name: Whoa, sounds like a tough life.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0009
rows.name: Pfft. Look at these softies.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0010
rows.name: Softies?!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0011
rows.name:
That's what I said! I thought
these were just warm-ups,
but apparently this is all they do?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0012
rows.name:
Warm-ups?!
You would insult our training regime?!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0013
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, would you mind if
I joined in with their training?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll show them what real
training is all about!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0015
rows.name: Uh...

rows.label: qst201701_msg0016
rows.name:
Wait a sec, Newt. You're
not an Superbian soldier.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0017
rows.name:
If you go charging in, won't it
be more of a problem than a benefit?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0018
rows.name:
You're right. Newt has nothing
to do with the army.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0019
rows.name: Aww, c'mon Meleph!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0020
rows.name:
But having said that, she is very strong.
I'm sure our soldiers could learn a lot.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0021
rows.name:
Ohboyohboyohboy, Meleph
complimented me! I can't believe it.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0022
rows.name: You won't regret this, I promise!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0023
rows.name:
Let's get started with a little
sparring match, shall we?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0024
rows.name: Sparring...?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0025
rows.name:
Yup. First we gotta let you know what
kind of power you're up against!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0026
rows.name:
Um, "we"?
Are we all doing this, then?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0027
rows.name: ...Roger that.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0028
rows.name:
But don't expect us to hold back
just because this isn't a real battle.
Think you can handle our best efforts?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0029
rows.name: Hah! Go for it!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0032
rows.name:
Then your opponents will be our
most elite soldiers!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0033
rows.name:
Oh, and you too, Mattragh!
You could do with seeing how a real
soldier fights, up close and personal!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0034
rows.name: Whaaaaaaa?!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0035
rows.name:
Well then, let's all give this
our best shot!
